## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with [x] -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Security
- [ ] I have checked for security vulnerabilities
- [ ] No sensitive data is exposed
- [ ] Input validation is in place
- [ ] Authentication/authorization checks are included where needed

### Performance
- [ ] I have considered performance implications
- [ ] No unnecessary re-renders or database queries
- [ ] Efficient algorithms and data structures used

### Deployment
- [ ] Database migrations are included (if applicable)
- [ ] Environment variables are documented (if applicable)
- [ ] Feature flags are used for risky changes (if applicable)
